Cara Delevingne.Interesting Fact: She started her modeling career at the age of 10. Delevingne was scouted by an agent while shopping with her mother in London. This marked the beginning of her successful journey in the fashion industry.

Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
Oscar-winning Films: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
Brad Pitt.Interesting Fact: Brad Pitt is not just an actor, but also a film producer. He has produced several successful films, including '12 Years a Slave' which won the Academy Award for Best Picture.

Ryan Gosling.Interesting Fact: Ryan Gosling started his career as a child actor and gained recognition for his role in the television series 'Breaker High'. He later transitioned into film and became known for his performances in romantic dramas.

Amber Heard.Interesting Fact: Amber Heard is not just an actress, but also an activist. She has been involved in several causes, including raising awareness about domestic violence and supporting organizations that work towards gender equality.

Sylvester Stallone.Interesting Fact: Sylvester Stallone is not just an actor, but also a screenwriter and film director. He wrote the script for the movie 'Rocky' and went on to win the Academy Award for Best Picture and Best Original Screenplay for it.

Jason Statham.Interesting Fact: Jason Statham is known for performing his own stunts in action films. He has a background in martial arts and has trained in various combat techniques, which he brings to life in his roles.

Elon Musk.Interesting Fact: Elon Musk is not an actor but a business magnate and entrepreneur. He is the CEO of Tesla, SpaceX, Neuralink, and The Boring Company. Musk is known for his ambitious vision of advancing technology and making breakthroughs in various industries.
